meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>bright</kanji> and <kanji>clear</kanji> has great <vocabulary>clarity</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>clearness</vocabulary>. Just look at something with such brightness and such clearness! It has so much clarity!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
